Html: I work for an editing company, and I am woefully new at Word 2010. I am looking to download the BibWord styles. I managed to download the zip files but what I need is a step-by-step tutorial on how to drop them into Word. There is nothing on this site that I have found that has this. I am not the most computer literate person on the block. I usually learn from messing things up. Thanks in advance.

See http://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Styles&referringTitle=Documentation&ANCHOR#Installation

Also see http://bibword.codeplex.com/releases/view/15852 and the remarks about 64 vs 32 bit that some users made in the comments.
